metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35533 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within the "LibRaw::adobe_copy_pixel()" function (libraw\src\decoders\dng.cpp) when reading data from the image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1
libraw19 - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.

libraw package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1').
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
